name: Capecci, Appellant, v. Joseph Capecci, Inc.

judges: Before Jones, C. J. Bell, Chidsey, Mtjsmanno, Jones and Cohen, JJ.
parties: Capecci, Appellant, v. Joseph Capecci, Inc.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The judgment of the Court below is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Beimel of the Court of Common Pleas No. 5 of Philadelphia County, reported in 11 Pa. D. & C. 2d 459.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Park B. Bilks, Jr., with him Souser, Schumacher, Kleeb & Lunkenheimer, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Capecci, Appellant, v. Joseph Capecci, Inc.
Argued January 13, 1958.
Before Jones, C. J. Bell, Chidsey, Mtjsmanno, Jones and Cohen, JJ.
Norman Shigon, for appellant.
Park B. Bilks, Jr., with him Souser, Schumacher, Kleeb & Lunkenheimer, for appellee.
March 17, 1958:
